Arbalistic.title: Arbalistic
Arbalistic.description: Kill five unique mobs with one crossbow shot

Bullseye.title: Bullseye
Bullseye.description: Hit the bullseye of a Target block from at least 30 meters away

Light as a Rabbit.title: Light as a Rabbit
Light as a Rabbit.description: Walk on powder snow...without sinking in it

Surge Protector.title: Surge Protector
Surge Protector.description: Protect a villager from an undesired shock without starting a fire

Is It a Bird?.title: Is It a Bird?
Is It a Bird?.description: Look at a parrot through a spyglass

Is It a Balloon?.title: Is It a Balloon?
Is It a Balloon?.description: Look at a ghast through a spyglass

Is It a Plane?.title: Is It a Plane?
Is It a Plane?.description: Look at the Ender Dragon through a spyglass

Hero of the Village.title: Hero of the Village
Hero of the Village.description: Successfully defend a village from a raid

Sticky Situation.title: Sticky Situation
Sticky Situation.description: Jump into a Honey Block to break your fall

Monsters Hunted.title: Monsters Hunted
Monsters Hunted.description: Kill one of every hostile monster

Sweet Dreams.title: Sweet Dreams
Sweet Dreams.description: Sleep in a bed to change your respawn point

Sniper Duel.title: Sniper Duel
Sniper Duel.description: Kill a Skeleton from at least 50 meters away

Hired Help.title: Hired Help
Hired Help.description: Summon an Iron Golem to help defend a village

Postmortal.title: Postmortal
Postmortal.description: Use a Totem of Undying to cheat death

A Throwaway Joke.title: A Throwaway Joke
A Throwaway Joke.description:
Throw a trident at something.
Note: Throwing away your only weapon is not a good idea.

Two Birds, One Arrow.title: Two Birds, One Arrow
Two Birds, One Arrow.description: Kill two Phantoms with a piercing arrow

Voluntary Exile.title: Voluntary Exile
Voluntary Exile.description:
Kill a raid captain.
Maybe consider staying away from villages for the time being...

Who's the Pillager Now?.title: Who's the Pillager Now?
Who's the Pillager Now?.description: Give a Pillager a taste of their own medicine

Husbandry.title: Husbandry
Husbandry.description: The world is full of friends and food

Glow and Behold!.title: Glow and Behold!
Glow and Behold!.description: Make the text of a sign glow

Whatever Floats Your Goat!.title: Whatever Floats Your Goat!
Whatever Floats Your Goat!.description: Get in a Boat and float with a Goat

Tactical Fishing.title: Tactical Fishing
Tactical Fishing.description: Catch a fish... without a fishing rod!

The Cutest Predator.title: The Cutest Predator
The Cutest Predator.description: Catch an axolotl in a bucket

The Healing Power of Friendship!.title: The Healing Power of Friendship!
The Healing Power of Friendship!.description: Team up with an axolotl and win a fight

A Seedy Place.title: A Seedy Place
A Seedy Place.description: Plant a seed and watch it grow

Serious Dedication.title: Serious Dedication
Serious Dedication.description: Use a Netherite ingot to upgrade a hoe, and then reevaluate your life choices

A Balanced Diet.title: A Balanced Diet
A Balanced Diet.description: Eat everything that is edible, even if it's not good for you

Bee Our Guest.title: Bee Our Guest
Bee Our Guest.description: Use a Campfire to collect Honey from a Beehive using a Bottle without aggravating the bees

Total Beelocation.title: Total Beelocation
Total Beelocation.description: Move a Bee Nest, with 3 bees inside, using Silk Touch

Wax On.title: Wax On
Wax On.description: Apply Honeycomb to a Copper block!

Wax Off.title: Wax Off
Wax Off.description: Scrape Wax off of a Copper block!

You Need a Mint.title: You Need a Mint
You Need a Mint.description: Collect dragon's breath in a glass bottle

The City at the End of the Game.title: The City at the End of the Game
The City at the End of the Game.description: Go on in, what could happen?

Great View From Up Here.title: Great View From Up Here
Great View From Up Here.description: Levitate up 50 blocks from the attacks of a Shulker

A Furious Cocktail.title: A Furious Cocktail
A Furious Cocktail.description: Have every potion effect applied at the same time

How Did We Get Here?.title: How Did We Get Here?
How Did We Get Here?.description: Have every effect applied at the same time

Beaconator.title: Beaconator
Beaconator.description: Bring a beacon to full power

A Terrible Fortress.title: A Terrible Fortress
A Terrible Fortress.description: Break your way into a Nether Fortress

Into Fire.title: Into Fire
Into Fire.description: Relieve a Blaze of its rod

Return to Sender.title: Return to Sender
Return to Sender.description: Destroy a Ghast with a fireball

Subspace Bubble.title: Subspace Bubble
Subspace Bubble.description: Use the Nether to travel 7 km in the Overworld

Uneasy Alliance.title: Uneasy Alliance
Uneasy Alliance.description: Rescue a Ghast from the Nether, bring it safely home to the Overworld... and then kill it

Cover Me in Debris.title: Cover Me in Debris
Cover Me in Debris.description: Get a full suit of Netherite armor

Country Lode, Take Me Home.title: Country Lode, Take Me Home
Country Lode, Take Me Home.description: Use a compass on a Lodestone

Not Quite \"Nine\" Lives.title: Not Quite "Nine" Lives
Not Quite \"Nine\" Lives.description: Charge a Respawn Anchor to the maximum

This Boat Has Legs.title: This Boat Has Legs
This Boat Has Legs.description: Ride a Strider with a Warped Fungus on a Stick

War Pigs.title: War Pigs
War Pigs.description: Loot a chest in a Bastion Remnant

Zombie Doctor.title: Zombie Doctor
Zombie Doctor.description: Weaken and then cure a Zombie Villager

Not Today, Thank You.title: Not Today, Thank You
Not Today, Thank You.description: Deflect a projectile with a shield

Enchanter.title: Enchanter
Enchanter.description: Enchant an item at an Enchanting Table

We Need to Go Deeper.title: We Need to Go Deeper
We Need to Go Deeper.description: Build, light and enter a Nether Portal

Stone Age.title: Stone Age
Stone Age.description: Mine stone with your new pickaxe

Suit Up.title: Suit Up
Suit Up.description: Protect yourself with a piece of iron armor

Minecraft.title: Minecraft
Minecraft.description: The heart and story of the game
